attributes.additional_details: last year 25,000 cattle had to be slaughtered due to badgers, in the last 10 years  us tax payers had to pay 500 million pounds due to badgers. Yes there are countless organisations protecting this destructive beast thing of the poor farmers who every time they get infected have to pay 30,000 pounds to get rid of it! The cull has been proven to work, in the last cull in 6 months alone it saw a 28.35 decline in the T.B infections. If its proven to work, and the people who are effected want the cull, why don’t we have one?
